description.value:
You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people. You gain the critical specialization effects of the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Battle Axe]{Battle Axe}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Hatchet]{Hatchet}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Longsword]{Longsword}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Shortsword]{Shortsword}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in the above four weapons.
